description: Defines a utility singleton object 'StringUtils' providing methods to join a LinkedList into a String and split a String into a LinkedList, delegating actual processing to 'JoinUtils' and 'SplitUtils'.

classes.name: StringUtils
classes.description: A singleton object providing string manipulation utilities by delegating to other utility classes.

methods.name: join
methods.description: Converts a LinkedList to a String by delegating to JoinUtils.join.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits a String into a LinkedList by delegating to SplitUtils.split.
